āohuāng, B53, BL53 足太阳膀胱经穴。在臀部，平第2骶后孔，骶正中嵴旁开3寸。

entry.def: B is the second letter of the English alphabet.

entry.tran: C大调音阶中的第七音；B音
entry.def: In music, B is the seventh note in the scale of C major.
If you get a B as a mark for a piece of work or in an exam, your work is good.

entry.tran: （用于首字母为b的一些单词的缩写，如born）
entry.def: B or b is used as an abbreviation for words beginning with b, for example 'born'.
